typeSystemDescription.name: AbbyyFineReader
typeSystemDescription.description: Types for documents constructed from the ABBYY FineReader OCR-engine output.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.ocr.abbyy.StructuralElement
typeDescription.description: Meta-Type for structural elements with pixel offsets in the ABBYY FineReader schema.

featureDescription.name: top
featureDescription.description: Coordinate of the top border, in pixels.

featureDescription.name: bottom
featureDescription.description: Coordinate of the bottom border, in pixels.

featureDescription.name: left
featureDescription.description: Coordinate of the left border, in pixels.

featureDescription.name: right
featureDescription.description: Coordinate of the right border, in pixels.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.ocr.abbyy.BlockType
typeDescription.description: The type of a block. It can be one of the following values: Text, Table, Picture, Barcode, Separator, SeparatorsBox, Checkmark, GroupCheckmark

featureDescription.name: baseline
featureDescription.description: The distance from the baseline to the top edge of the page, in pixels.

featureDescription.name: format
featureDescription.description: If present, this line denotes a group of characters with uniform formatting.

featureDescription.name: leftIndent
featureDescription.description: The left paragraph indent (optional, default value is 0)

featureDescription.name: rightIndent
featureDescription.description: The right paragraph indent (optional, default value is 0)

featureDescription.name: startIndent
featureDescription.description: The indent of the first line of the paragraph optional,default value is 0)

featureDescription.name: lineSpacing
featureDescription.description: The spacing between lines (optional, default value is 0)

featureDescription.name: alignment
featureDescription.description: The paragraph alignment (optional, default value is Left). It can be one of the following values: Left, Center, Right, Justified

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.ocr.abbyy.Format
typeDescription.description: Attributes of a line with uniform formatting.

featureDescription.name: lang
featureDescription.description: Name of the language.

featureDescription.name: ff
featureDescription.description: The name of the font.

featureDescription.name: fs
featureDescription.description: The size of the font.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.ocr.abbyy.Token
typeDescription.description: Token type that denotes recognized words.

featureDescription.name: subTokenList
featureDescription.description: Present if a linebreak hyphen was recognized, contains the individual words.

featureDescription.name: isWordFromDictionary
featureDescription.description: Specifies whether the word was found in the ABBYY FineReader dictionary.

featureDescription.name: isWordNormal
featureDescription.description: Specifies whether the word was recognized with either a standard or user-defined language, and that it is not a number or an identifier.

featureDescription.name: isWordNumeric
featureDescription.description: Specifies whether the word is a number

featureDescription.name: containsHyphen
featureDescription.description: Specifies if the word contains a recognized linebreak hyphen.

featureDescription.name: suspiciousChars
featureDescription.description: The number of characters that were recognized uncertainly.

featureDescription.name: minCharConfidence
featureDescription.description: The minimum character recognition confidence of all characters in this word. Use with caution, as these numbers are not guaranteed to be positive and, according to the ABBYY FineReader documentation, the only meaningful use of confidence is to compare different recognition variants of the same character.

featureDescription.name: meanCharConfidence
featureDescription.description: The average character recognition confidence of all characters in this word. Use with caution, as these numbers are not guaranteed to be positive and, according to the ABBYY FineReader documentation, the only meaningful use of confidence is to compare different recognition variants of the same character.

featureDescription.name: index
featureDescription.description: The page index, i.e. a running number assigned during the processing. Usually denoted in the file name as the first part, e.g. "1" for "01_123456789.xml"

featureDescription.name: pageNumber
featureDescription.description: The page number *as a String* as cover pages etc. are commonly numbered using roman numbers.

featureDescription.name: uri
featureDescription.description: URI of this page, i.e. a Visual Library link.

featureDescription.name: width
featureDescription.description: The image width in pixels.

featureDescription.name: height
featureDescription.description: The image height in pixels.

featureDescription.name: resolution
featureDescription.description: The image resolution in pixels per inch.

featureDescription.name: rotation
featureDescription.description: The type of rotation applied to original page image before processing (optional). It can be one of the following values: Normal, RotatedClockwise, RotatedUpsideDown, RotatedCounterclockwise

featureDescription.name: documentName
featureDescription.description: The name of this document in the XML files.

featureDescription.name: version
featureDescription.description: The version of the source XML files.

featureDescription.name: producer
featureDescription.description: The producer of the source XML files.

featureDescription.name: pagesCount
featureDescription.description: The number of pages in this document (optional).

featureDescription.name: mainLanguage
featureDescription.description: The main language of this document.

featureDescription.name: languages
featureDescription.description: All languages used in this document (optional).
